synopsis.text: In the year 2017 A.D., Chaldea, an organization dedicated to preserving humanity's future, discovers through their calculations that human extinction will occur in 2019. The cause lies in anomalous spacetime regions called "Singularities" that have begun appearing across history. To resolve this threat, Chaldea dispatches their last remaining Master, Ritsuka Fujimaru, and his Demi-Servant partner, Mash Kyrielight, on a mission dubbed the "Grand Order." By traveling to the past Singularities and resolving the abnormalities, they hope to restore proper human history and avert mankind's demise. Their seventh and final destination is Ancient Mesopotamia, 2655 B.C. Once a prosperous land ruled by King Gilgamesh, Babylonia now faces invasion by three goddesses and their army of Demonic Beasts. With Uruk already ravaged and its people struggling to defend their beloved city, Ritsuka and Mash must aid Gilgamesh in protecting Uruk from utter destruction. It will be their greatest battle yet, where the fate of the first and final bastion of humanity hangs in the balance. Old allies and new will join the fight as gods clash with men. And silently waiting in the shadows, an ancient evil begins to stir, threatening to eclipse even the Three Goddesses...
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
